root.title: “Gurvan Mandal” inscriptions, The
root.place: The inscriptions are written on a rock of district “Gurvan Mandym” in Buutsagaan sum of Bayankhongor aimag of Mongolia.
root.investigation: Archeologist Sanzhmjatav 448 in his monograph has published only a handwritten copy of the inscriptions. It is very vague figure. Therefore it is necessary to conduct researches in origin of the inscriptions in future. Battulga made further researches of the inscriptions in 2005. He published some photos and reading of the inscriptions 583.
